   - [aad5 fab2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Increased proportions of C18:0 and their elongated derivatives (C20:0 and  C22:0), concomitantly decreased levels of &
   - [ssi2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Spontaneous lesions, enhanced resistance to P. parasitica
   - [ssi2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;dwarf with crinkled leaves. conferred hyper-resistance to green peach aphid.
   - [ssi2-4]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Soil-grown ssi2-4 mutant plants exhibit dwarf phenotype and constitutively express the ER molecular chaperone BiP3.
